scripts.bundle: browserify -r ./lib/ajv.js:ajv -o ajv.bundle.js -s Ajv && uglifyjs ajv.bundle.js -o ajv.min.js -c pure_getters -m --source-map ajv.min.js.map -r Ajv --preamble '/* Ajv JSON-schema validator */'
scripts.bundle-regenerator: browserify -r ./node_modules/regenerator/main.js:regenerator -o regenerator.bundle.js && uglifyjs regenerator.bundle.js -o regenerator.min.js -c -m --source-map regenerator.min.js.map
scripts.bundle-nodent: browserify -r ./node_modules/nodent/nodent.js:nodent -t brfs -o nodent.bundle.js && uglifyjs nodent.bundle.js -o nodent.min.js -c -m --source-map nodent.min.js.map
scripts.bundle-all: npm run bundle && npm run bundle-regenerator && npm run bundle-nodent
scripts.test-browser: npm run bundle-all && scripts/prepare-tests && karma start --single-run --browsers PhantomJS
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run build && npm run test-cov && npm run test-browser
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run bundle-all && mkdir -p dist && mv ajv.* dist && mv regenerator.* dist && mv nodent.* dist
